funFacts.title: Did You Know About Tones?
funFacts.content: Cantonese has 6 to 9 tones, making it a head-scratcher for many translation tools! VibeTrans nails it by visualizing tones. I think it's like giving your words a colorful melody. Pretty wild, right?

funFacts.title: English Meets Cantonese
funFacts.content: Ever noticed how Cantonese borrows English words? Like 'taxi' becomes '的士'! VibeTrans smartly handles these quirky blends. I’ve always found this code-switching fascinating, and it makes translations a fun ride!
